channel.title: World Wide Wrestling: Gage Valley Wrestling: Parade of Heroes
channel.description:
![](/uploads/default/original/2X/e/ed24fe1aee0cd987d6a8cef7e3af671140bc2f93.png)
So, April 23rd is my 40th Birthday and while i'm not doing much to celebrate on the day I would invite folk to join me in the evening to play a game of World Wide Wrestling.
This game is inspired by the real life event "Collision in Korea" which you can find out more about with the links on the event page.
The event will start at 8pm and run for 3 hours.
https://gauntlet-hangouts.firebaseapp.com/event-detail/-LbeZeP0kCVCfCMCPlW0
